description: Nagi`s grandfather and the head of the Sanzen`in family, as well as one of the five directors in charge of Hakuou Academy. He lives in a mansion much bigger than Nagi`s mansion with many servants. It is unknown where the Sanzen`in fortune comes from but Nagi calls her grandfather an oil tycoon. He has the ability to judge a person`s character just by looking at them.
name: Sanzen`in Mikado
